roleset.name: bring back together

role.descr: other things, if separate from arg1

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: This July , a book published by the PRC entitled Chinese Foreign Policy , the Year 2000 , declared that its most important foreign policy goal is to " reunify the country , " and strongly attacked Taiwan 's efforts to be admitted to the United Nations .

example.name: two unified things in one node
example.text: The peaceful reunification of the two sides across the Taiwan Straits

propbank.arg: of the two sides across the Taiwan Straits

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Niall Matter discusses his reunion with Colin Ferguson on ' Primeval : New World .

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: His reunion of two aging Western geezers is classic American dramatic metaphor - a long day 's journey into night if ever was one .

roleset.note: REUNIFY-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from reunify.01-v)
REUNIFICATION-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to reunity.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from reunification.01-n)
REUNION-N NOTES: Expanded by Julia based on BOLT. Corresponds to VNcls Vncls correspond-36.1, meet-36.3-1. (from reunion.01-n)
